description.value: Whenever you critically hit using @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Flail]{Flail}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Khopesh]{Khopesh}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Mambele]{Mambele}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Spear]{Spear}, and @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.War Flail]{War Flail}, you apply the weapon's critical specialization effect.

source.value: Pathfinder Lost Omens: The Mwangi Expanse
